summary: AC WENT OUT IN MID-MAY.  DEALERSHIP STATES IT'S A CONDENSER ISSUE.  NATIONAL BACK ORDER BECAUSE SO MANY HAVE HAD SAME ISSUES.  BAD WELD ON PART AND OEM IS NOW OUT OF BUSINESS.  BEEN WAITING FOR ALMOST 2 MONTHS FOR PART TO COME IN.  VEHICLE OUT OF WARRANTY, GM RECOGNIZES ISSUE WITH PART BUT WILL NOT ISSUE RECALL.  I DRIVE A TON FOR WORK (IN A SUIT) AND HAVE MY 3 YEAR OLD SON RIDING AT ALL OTHER TIMES.  GM WILL NOT OFFER COURTESY VEHICLE AND WANTS TO STICK ME WITH $1200 BILL.  THEY KNOW THERE'S A PROBLEM AND WILL DO NOTHING ABOUT IT.
